item.title: Graphing CGP Grey’s Rock-Paper-Scissors YouTube Game
item.dc:creator: Dheepak Krishnamurthy
item.description: If you haven’t already checked it out, go watch CGPGrey’s Rock-Paper-Scissors YouTube Game.

item.title: Julia Workflow Tips and Tricks
item.dc:creator: Dheepak Krishnamurthy
item.description: Julia is a high-performance, dynamic programming language designed for technical computing and data science. The language offers a flexible and expressive syntax, and also delivers the performance benefits of compiled languages like C++. Like Python, Julia also offers an interactive REPL (Read-Eval-Print Loop) environment for real-time data exploration and rapid prototyping.

item.title: Visualizing roads in the cities of Canada
item.dc:creator: Dheepak Krishnamurthy

item.title: Understanding variables and mutability in Julia
item.dc:creator: Dheepak Krishnamurthy
item.description: I would like to present a mental model for understanding the basics of variable assignment and mutability in Julia using an analogy involving books and bookshelves, from a complete beginner’s perspective.

item.title: Programmers’ preferences for package names
item.dc:creator: Dheepak Krishnamurthy
item.description: Are there trends in choosing package names in various programming ecosystems? Do package authors choose names for their packages that are alliterated with the name of the programming language? Let’s venture to find out.

item.title: Advent of Code 2020 Retrospective
item.dc:creator: Dheepak Krishnamurthy
item.description: It is Christmas night, and it is the first time this month that I haven’t had to plan my schedule for the evening around a programming puzzle contest. For the last 25 days this month, I participated in Advent of Code 2020, and I managed to collect all 50 stars!

item.title: My Unicode cheat sheet
item.dc:creator: Dheepak Krishnamurthy
item.description: I wanted to make a cheat sheet for myself containing a reference of things I use when it comes to Unicode and when using Unicode in Vim, Python, Julia and Rust.
